name: Zombieland: Heads will Roll
description:
Game Jam 153 submission.  Race around an outdoor track and run over as many zombies and barrels as you can.  Didnt get all the elements complete for the jam but its fun to just drive around and run over stuff.

Still to do:

Detect the end of the race and store best time/high scores, add sound, display gear, speed and distance in HUD, make the barrel explode on impact, add some more zombie models, car physics on hill is strange, cycle day/night, swap mesh of car based on selection, coordinate streetlamps/checkpoint lights with time of day

A nice relaxing drive through video can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nDqw2Pkaob8
